description:
In this course you will learn chess tactics with me- Grigor Yovov form the YouTube show "Chess StoryTeller". The course is mainly video lectures with exact exercises, that will help you to:

  • Learn how to win a chess game with tactics
  • Learn how to forceÂ checkmate
  • Learn how to use a sacrafice to win a game
  • Learn how to use a sacrafice to win material
  • Learn how to escape form traps
  • Learn how to stay sharp in the game
  • Learn how to keep the tempo on your side

After this course you will:

  • Improve your game concentration
  • Improve your ability to see unstandart moves
  • Improve your understanding of the tempo in chess

Take this course and hava a fun with me!
title: Win chess games with Tactics course by Chess StoryTeller
